title: Koi Pond Zac
body:
I've mentioned this idea before, but an interesting skin for Zac would be a transparent skin with things floating about inside, in this case turning him into a walking fishpond. His blobs would be replaced with fish flopping about that you have to go pick up.

Here's a basic idea of what it would look like:

The thing about Zac is because of the way he works and his design, any skin that is made for him is pretty much just a recolor. I doubt anyone will pay for a recolor skin...just my opinion.

This is not intended as a recolour (a 520 RP skin). Getting this to work would require two layers of art assets: Zac with a transparent blue recolour, but also a new mesh and skeleton to handle the fish.
Gonna be a nightmare design wise. Not saying it can't be done, but Riot's probably going to treat it (and price it) as a legendary skin.
